title: ASD for Early 2015 A1534??
message:
Does anyone have access to this? 

Thanks in advance.

title: ASD for Early 2015 A1534??
message: Your local AASP with a GSX login can run MRI/AST on it. No other test besides the built in diagnostics available. Why do you need it?

title: ASD for Early 2015 A1534??
message:
Hey Duke!

The display on his computer randomly will freeze with have a checker like grid on it. Becomes totally unresponsive. History - I know that the display was recently replaced by Apple for a blueish line across it. 

Thank you.

title: ASD for Early 2015 A1534??
message: Try running Passmark Memtest or equivalent third party memory testing software.

title: ASD for Early 2015 A1534??
message: RAM/CPU issue, forget about this one.
